title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
**Unleash Your Creativity with the Finest Pencils - Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils**

Elevate your writing and drawing experience with the legendary Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, expertly crafted for artists, writers, and students alike. With a rich history of over 100 years of excellence, Ticonderoga has set the standard for premium writing instruments.

This 30-count pack of pre-sharpened pencils features our exclusive #2 graphite formula, renowned for its smooth performance and consistent lines. The thick graphite core ensures that your marks are bold, yet precise, making them ideal for everyday writing, drawing, and sketching.

**What sets Ticonderoga apart:**

- Responsibly sourced premium wood, harvested from managed forests
- Durable golden yellow lacquer finish with a matte coating
- Latex-free eraser that removes marks completely without smudging
- Signature green and gold ferrule for a touch of sophistication
- PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring safety for users of all ages

**Preferred by Teachers and Artists**

Ticonderoga's commitment to quality and craftsmanship has made our pencils the go-to choice for educators and artists worldwide. Whether you're a student, a professional artist, or simply a creative enthusiast, our pencils will help you bring your ideas to life with precision and confidence.

**Upgrade Your Writing and Drawing Experience Today**

Invest in the best â€“ choose Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils for unparalleled performance, durability, and style. Order now and discover why our pencils have been the gold standard for generations of creatives.
